Route FQA & Summary

Kirti Nagar to Green Park Metro Route FAQs:

𝒬. What are the timings of first metro and last metro from Green Park to Kirti Nagar?

𝒜. Actually, here you will get the first train or last train information of Source station only. So the first train is at 05:55 AM and the last train is at: 11:55 PM from Kirti Nagar.

𝒬. How far is Green Park metro station from Kirti Nagar metro station?

𝒜. The total travel distance between Kirti Nagar and Green Park is approx 15.4 KM.

𝒬. How many stops this route has between Green Park and Kirti Nagar station ?

𝒜. The number of total stations are 14 between Kirti Nagar to Green Park metro station.

𝒬. How much time it takes to reach Green Park metro station from Kirti Nagar metro station?

𝒜. The approx travel time will be 0:28:0 hh:mm:ss between Kirti Nagar and Green Park.

𝒬. Does Kirti Nagar metro station has parking facility?

𝒜. No. Kirti Nagar metro station do not have any parking facility.

𝒬. Is Feeder bus facility available at Green Park metro station?

𝒜. No. The facility of feeder bus service is not available at Green Park metro station.

Route Summary

There are total number of intermediate active metro stations are 14 between Kirti Nagar to Green Park metro station.The approx travel time between this route is 0:28:0 hh:mm:ss. And the total travel distance between Kirti Nagar to Green Park is 15.4 KM.

The metro fare for this route is Rs. 40 DMRC, and concessions may apply to smartcards. The first metro from Kirti Nagar to Green Park is 05:55 AM and the last metro is at 11:55 PM.

Both metro stations have paid parking facility based on various slabs as per vehicle. This route has 2 interchange station, where you can change the train to reach the destination.
